name: Cursed 2
description:
Inspired by classic point and click horror games like Uninvited and Last Half of Darkness, Cursed 2 is a horror/action hybrid with RPG elements. Search a desolate town for traces of your childhood friend. Solve the mystery of the town's abandonment.

Features:
-Explore an entire abandoned town in retro point-and-click style
-Do battle with unholy creatures in difficult real time combat
-Solve puzzles and use inventory to progress the story
-Inventory management and level-ups help to gain strenth and battle tougher bosses
-Chilling atmosphere and classic pc-indie-game vibes
-Unique blend of action and puzzle solving
-Multiple endings and around 10 hours of gameplay.

Cursed was created in 2009. Its sequel, CURSED 2 began in 2011, but only started actual development in august 2018, due to youtube interest. This follow-up to the retro point and click horror original includes tons of locales, enemies, bosses, items, and all new mechanics! It was fully released in april 2019.
